MESSAGE.JP: 朝。
MESSAGE.EN: Next morning.
MESSAGE.Translation: Next morning.

MESSAGE.JP: 事に風邪を引いてしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: I ended up catching a cold.
MESSAGE.Translation: I ended up catching a cold.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「３７度９分か。普通に風邪だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝37.9 degrees. Just a common cold.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝37.9 degrees. Just a common cold.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ったくよぉ、普段から鍛えてねぇから風邪なんか引いちまうんだよ。よわっちいな、おまえは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Geez, that's what you get for never working out. You're too weak.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Geez, that's what you get for never working out. You're too weak.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえは何があっても風邪は引かないからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You wouldn't catch a cold no matter what happens, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You wouldn't catch a cold no matter what happens, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ははっ、ありがとよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Haha, thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Haha, thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あほだ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Stupid!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Stupid!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「まあ、今日はゆっくり休め。何かあったらすぐ連絡できるよう、枕元に携帯は置いておけよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You should rest for today. If something happens, you give us a call. I'll put your cell on your bedside table.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You should rest for today. If something happens, you give us a call. I'll put your cell on your bedside table.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「じゃあ、ゆっくり養生しろよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rest well and recover soon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rest well and recover soon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あ、てめえ馬鹿は風邪ひかねえってのかぁーっ!!　やんのかこらぁーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Ah, you're saying I'm not gonna catch a cold since I'm stupid, huh!? You got some nerve!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Ah, you're saying I'm not gonna catch a cold since I'm stupid, huh!? You got some nerve!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ごろ気付いた…。
MESSAGE.EN: Took him long enough to realize...
MESSAGE.Translation: Took him long enough to realize...

MESSAGE.JP: きぃ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Whack*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Whack*!

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「病人の前でうっさいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝There's a sick person here, pipe down!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝There's a sick person here, pipe down!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…ごめんなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ふん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hmph...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hmph...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人は部屋を出て行った。
MESSAGE.EN: All four of them left the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: All four of them left the room.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（…うあぁ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Whoa...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Whoa...)

MESSAGE.JP: やばい、マジでだるい…。
MESSAGE.EN: My head feels so heavy...
MESSAGE.Translation: My head feels so heavy...

MESSAGE.JP: 人が用意してくれた濡れタオルを額に当て直すと、僕はそのまま寝に入ることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I applied a wet towel that they had prepared to my forehead and drifted off to sleep.
MESSAGE.Translation: I applied a wet towel that they had prepared to my forehead and drifted off to sleep.

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ谷さんはだいじょうぶだったんだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder if Kurugaya-san is alright...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder if Kurugaya-san is alright...

MESSAGE.JP: の人のことだから、きっとだいじょうぶなんだろうなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess I don't have to worry about her...
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess I don't have to worry about her...

MESSAGE.JP: んなことを思いながら、意識は沈んでいった。
MESSAGE.EN: These thoughts went through my mind, as my consciousness faded away.
MESSAGE.Translation: These thoughts went through my mind, as my consciousness faded away.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（うう…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Uhh...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Uhh...)

MESSAGE.JP: っすらと眠りから覚める。
MESSAGE.EN: I awoke from my light slumber.
MESSAGE.Translation: I awoke from my light slumber.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（まだだるい…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(I still feel languid...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(I still feel languid...)

MESSAGE.JP: ぶたも開けずに考える。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't open my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't open my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: あでも、朝に比べたら全然マシかな…。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, at least I'm feeling much better compared to this morning...
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, at least I'm feeling much better compared to this morning...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（もう一眠りしよう…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(I should just keep sleeping...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(I should just keep sleeping...)

MESSAGE.JP: う思った時。
MESSAGE.EN: And just when I thought so...
MESSAGE.Translation: And just when I thought so...

MESSAGE.JP: に冷たい感覚。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt something cool on my forehead.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt something cool on my forehead.

MESSAGE.JP: タオルが載せ代えられたみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Seems like someone had put the towel back.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seems like someone had put the towel back.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（あれ…誰かもう帰ってきたのかな）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Oh... Did someone come back already?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Oh... Did someone come back already?)

MESSAGE.JP: 間の感覚はほとんどないけど、いくらなんでも、あれから放課後の時間まで一気に寝入ってしまったとは思えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I had lost track of time, but still it didn't seem likely that I had been asleep for so long that classes were over already.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had lost track of time, but still it didn't seem likely that I had been asleep for so long that classes were over already.

MESSAGE.JP: を開けてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I opened my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I opened my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「おや」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Oh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Oh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 目の前に来ヶ谷さんの顔があった。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a familiar face right in front of me. It was Kurugaya-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a familiar face right in front of me. It was Kurugaya-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「起きたかね、理樹君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You're awake, Riki-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You're awake, Riki-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「な、なっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wh, wha...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wh, wha...❞

MESSAGE.JP: わず身を起こして後ずさる。
MESSAGE.EN: I instinctively roused my body and pulled away from her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I instinctively roused my body and pulled away from her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「来ヶ谷さん、何でここに!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san, why are you here!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san, why are you here!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「見舞いに来たからに決まっているだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'm here to check up on you, what other reason could there be?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I'm here to check up on you, what other reason could there be?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやそういうことじゃなくてっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, that's not what I'm asking...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, that's not what I'm asking...❞

MESSAGE.JP: にかけてある時計に目をやる。
MESSAGE.EN: I shot a glance at the clock on the wall.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shot a glance at the clock on the wall.

MESSAGE.JP: 十二時前。
MESSAGE.EN: Almost twelve...
MESSAGE.Translation: Almost twelve...

MESSAGE.JP: 校ではちょうど数学の時間だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was math class at this time.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was math class at this time.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（わざわざこっちに来てくれたってことか…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Did she come all the way here for me...?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Did she come all the way here for me...?)

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「まあ時間を有意義に消費しに来たというわけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, you could say I'm here to waste time in a worthwhile fashion.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, you could say I'm here to waste time in a worthwhile fashion.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「こんな可愛らしい女学生に部屋を訪問されるというのも、まんざらではあるまい。いやいや大いに喜べ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You shouldn't feel too bad having a charming young girl, such as myself, come visit your room. If anything, you should be ecstatic.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You shouldn't feel too bad having a charming young girl, such as myself, come visit your room. If anything, you should be ecstatic.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、来てくれたのは嬉しいけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I'm glad you came.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I'm glad you came.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んか、割と情けない気持ちもある。
MESSAGE.EN: But still, I felt somewhat pathetic.
MESSAGE.Translation: But still, I felt somewhat pathetic.

MESSAGE.JP: いうか、胸元に目が行く…。
MESSAGE.EN: My eyes wandered to her breasts...
MESSAGE.Translation: My eyes wandered to her breasts...

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Mm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Mm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「い、いや…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝N-no...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝N-no...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「なんだ、やっぱり具合が悪いか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What, you're not feeling well after all?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What, you're not feeling well after all?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、いや、そういうわけじゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, no, that's not it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, no, that's not it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「して、少し身をそちらに移してもらえるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Why don't you move a bit that way to make some room?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Why don't you move a bit that way to make some room?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや…なんでさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait... Why would I?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait... Why would I?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「おねーさんが添い寝をしてやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Onee-san will sleep together with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Onee-san will sleep together with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、いいからっ！　そんなことしなくていいからっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, you don't have to! You really don't have to!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, you don't have to! You really don't have to!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「はっはっは、気にするな。病人を優しく介抱するのは当然のことだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Ha-ha-ha, don't mind it. It's a most natural thing to do when looking after a sick person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Ha-ha-ha, don't mind it. It's a most natural thing to do when looking after a sick person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「遠慮してるわけじゃないからっ！　普通にやめてほしいんだけどっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm not just acting reserved! I really would like you to stop right there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm not just acting reserved! I really would like you to stop right there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「少年の心は全くもって解し難いな。いやいや興味深い」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Young man, your mind is still a perpetual mystery to me. This is all most intriguing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Young man, your mind is still a perpetual mystery to me. This is all most intriguing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 横で寝られたりしたら、眠れるもんも眠れなくなるし…。
MESSAGE.EN: If I had her lying right next to me, there's no way in hell I'd be able to sleep soundly...
MESSAGE.Translation: If I had her lying right next to me, there's no way in hell I'd be able to sleep soundly...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ていうか、上着は…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hang on, where's your blazer...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hang on, where's your blazer...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「うむ、添い寝をしようかと考えていたところだったからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, I took it off since we're going to sleep together.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, I took it off since we're going to sleep together.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「薄い方が体温は伝わりやすいだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝The less clothes, the better the heat transfers.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝The less clothes, the better the heat transfers.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「着てくださいお願いします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Put it on, I beg you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Put it on, I beg you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 々危ないところだった…。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a dangerous situation in more ways than one...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a dangerous situation in more ways than one...

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「うむ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: りあえず上着を着てもらった。
MESSAGE.EN: I made her put her blazer back on.
MESSAGE.Translation: I made her put her blazer back on.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Ugh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Ugh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いでたらまた気分悪くなってきた…。
MESSAGE.EN: Having become agitated, I started feeling ill again...
MESSAGE.Translation: Having become agitated, I started feeling ill again...

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「む、だいじょうぶか理樹君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Is everything okay, Riki-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Is everything okay, Riki-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だいじょうぶだったら学校休んだりしないよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If it was, I wouldn't be taking a day off...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If it was, I wouldn't be taking a day off...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 力して倒れこむ。
MESSAGE.EN: All my strength escaped me, and I crashed back onto the bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: All my strength escaped me, and I crashed back onto the bed.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「しかし、こんな時期に風邪とは、余程無茶なことをしたのだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I must say, though, you must have done something crazy to catch a cold at this time of year.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I must say, though, you must have done something crazy to catch a cold at this time of year.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、来ヶ谷さんも同じことしてるからさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Actually, you did the same exact thing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Actually, you did the same exact thing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「…そうだったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Is that so...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Is that so...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「では、理樹君の体が弱いということだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝So that means your body is just weak.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝So that means your body is just weak.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（来ヶ谷さんの体が強すぎるって考え方もあるけどね…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(One could also argue that it's her body that's too strong...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(One could also argue that it's her body that's too strong...)

MESSAGE.JP: んか、口に出してツッコむ気もあんまりしない。
MESSAGE.EN: I refrained from voicing my observation aloud.
MESSAGE.Translation: I refrained from voicing my observation aloud.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「朝から何か喉に通したのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Did you eat anything since this morning?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Did you eat anything since this morning?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…スポーツドリンクを少し」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Only drank a little of a sports drink...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Only drank a little of a sports drink...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「それはいかんな。リンゴを持ってきて正解だった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝That's no good. I'm glad I brought an apple.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝That's no good. I'm glad I brought an apple.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ谷さんは鞄からビニール袋を取り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: She took a plastic bag out of her bag.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took a plastic bag out of her bag.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（どっから用意してきたんだろう…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(When did she get it...?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(When did she get it...?)

MESSAGE.JP: 邪引いたのは今朝だし、来ヶ谷さんが風邪のことを知るとすれば、教室に着いてからのはずだし…。
MESSAGE.EN: It was only this morning that I caught a cold, and she could only find out about my condition in the classroom, so...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was only this morning that I caught a cold, and she could only find out about my condition in the classroom, so...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（うわ…考えてると気持ち悪くなってくる…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Whoa... I started feeling worse just by thinking about it...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Whoa... I started feeling worse just by thinking about it...)

MESSAGE.JP: とまず思考を止める。
MESSAGE.EN: I shouldn't put too much thought in it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shouldn't put too much thought in it.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「よく考えたらキッチンもないな。まあ、洗面台でいいか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Now that I think of it, there's no kitchen here. Well, a sink will do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Now that I think of it, there's no kitchen here. Well, a sink will do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それから少し間を置いて、水の流れる音。戸棚から皿を出す音もひとつ。
MESSAGE.EN: After some time, I heard the sound of running water. Then I heard her take a plate from the dresser.
MESSAGE.Translation: After some time, I heard the sound of running water. Then I heard her take a plate from the dresser.

MESSAGE.JP: して、ベッドのすぐ近くでシャリシャリとリンゴの皮をむく音が聞こえ始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: And at last, I heard her start peeling the apple somewhere near the bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: And at last, I heard her start peeling the apple somewhere near the bed.

MESSAGE.JP: は途切れることなく、一定調子でリズムを刻んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: It was an uninterrupted, rhythmic sound, her pace was so steady...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was an uninterrupted, rhythmic sound, her pace was so steady...

MESSAGE.JP: んだか、落ち着くリズムだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt comfortable listening to it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt comfortable listening to it.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「見ろ、見事に一本だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Look, one perfect continuous strip.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Look, one perfect continuous strip.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ谷さんはリンゴの皮をつまむと、僕の目の前でひらひらと動かして見せた。
MESSAGE.EN: She lifted the skin of the apple up before my eyes and waved it around in the air.
MESSAGE.Translation: She lifted the skin of the apple up before my eyes and waved it around in the air.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（ああ、やっぱりこういうのも上手いんだなぁ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Ah, I knew she'd be good even at something like that...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Ah, I knew she'd be good even at something like that...)

MESSAGE.JP: るい頭でそんなことを思った。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought this in my hazy mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought this in my hazy mind.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「…そうだな、食べやすいように小さくしてやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Let's see, how about I slice it up so that it's easier for you to eat?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Let's see, how about I slice it up so that it's easier for you to eat?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ふむ、まな板はあるかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hmm, do you have a cutting board?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hmm, do you have a cutting board?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…洗面台の下」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Under the sink.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Under the sink.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「了解した」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Roger.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Roger.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ちの部屋には、真人の用意した料理道具が一通り揃っている。
MESSAGE.EN: We had a complete selection of cooking utensils in our room, prepared by Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: We had a complete selection of cooking utensils in our room, prepared by Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: 家庭用じゃなくてサバイバル用のものが大半なんだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Most of them, however, were survival gear, rather than meant for day-to-day use.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Most of them, however, were survival gear, rather than meant for day-to-day use.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「よし、出来たぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Alright, I'm done.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Alright, I'm done.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ谷さんはそう言うと、僕の枕元にリンゴの乗った皿を置いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san spoke as she placed the plate with the apple by my pillow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san spoke as she placed the plate with the apple by my pillow.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ほら、あーん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Come on, say aah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Come on, say aah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 元にリンゴを突きつけられる。
MESSAGE.EN: She thrust a slice of apple at my mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: She thrust a slice of apple at my mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「い、いや、しなくて大丈夫だから、そういうの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I-it's okay, you don't have to do that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I-it's okay, you don't have to do that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「口移しのほうがお好みか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Do you prefer to be fed mouth-to-mouth?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Do you prefer to be fed mouth-to-mouth?❞

MESSAGE.JP: いながら、手にしたリンゴを自分の口の中に運ぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: Speaking thus, Kurugaya-san brought the apple slice she was holding into her own mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: Speaking thus, Kurugaya-san brought the apple slice she was holding into her own mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや待った、やめてってばっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, hold on, don't do that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, hold on, don't do that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ほんのジョークだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I was just kidding.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I was just kidding.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そのまま飲み込んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She swallowed it down.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She swallowed it down.

MESSAGE.JP: や、なんか止めなかったらほんとにやってきたような気もする。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't avoid the feeling that had I not stopped her, she'd really have done it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't avoid the feeling that had I not stopped her, she'd really have done it.

MESSAGE.JP: や、やっぱりまずいだろ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I knew it'd turn out like this...
MESSAGE.Translation: I knew it'd turn out like this...

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ああ、結構美味いな。これを食わないのは犯罪だぞ少年」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Ah, it's delicious. It's a crime you're not eating, young man.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Ah, it's delicious. It's a crime you're not eating, young man.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…まあ、食べるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Well, I was going to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Well, I was going to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: っかく用意してくれたんだし。
MESSAGE.EN: She went through the trouble to peel it for me, after all.
MESSAGE.Translation: She went through the trouble to peel it for me, after all.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「うむ、まあ病中とはいえ何も食わないのは毒だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, even if you're sick, not eating will only harm you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, even if you're sick, not eating will only harm you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「多少無理してでも何かを胃に入れたほうがいいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Even if you're not feeling hungry, you must force yourself to eat something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Even if you're not feeling hungry, you must force yourself to eat something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: う言うと、もうひとつリンゴをつまむ。
MESSAGE.EN: Saying so, she took another slice of apple.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saying so, she took another slice of apple.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 直、食欲はほとんどない。
MESSAGE.EN: I honestly didn't feel like eating.
MESSAGE.Translation: I honestly didn't feel like eating.

MESSAGE.JP: あそれでも、と一口リンゴをかじってみた。
MESSAGE.EN: But I still took a bite of it.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I still took a bite of it.

MESSAGE.JP: 飲み込む。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I gulped it down.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I gulped it down.

MESSAGE.JP: れだけで何か、ものすごい重労働をしてる気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: That alone felt like a Herculean task to me...
MESSAGE.Translation: That alone felt like a Herculean task to me...

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ああ、スマン…つい全部手を出してしまった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Ah, my bad... I ended up eating everything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Ah, my bad... I ended up eating everything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が苦労して一欠けら食べ終わるうちに、来ヶ谷さんは残りを食べ終えてしまったらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: While I was painstakingly trying to finish just one slice of apple, she had managed to eat the rest of it.
MESSAGE.Translation: While I was painstakingly trying to finish just one slice of apple, she had managed to eat the rest of it.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「よし、もう一個むくとしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Okay, I'll do it to another one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Okay, I'll do it to another one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ニール袋からもうひとつ取り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: She produced another apple from her bag.
MESSAGE.Translation: She produced another apple from her bag.

MESSAGE.JP: た響き始める、シャリシャリという音。
MESSAGE.EN: The sound of the apple being peeled filled the room again.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sound of the apple being peeled filled the room again.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…来ヶ谷さん、上手だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Kurugaya-san, you're so good at it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Kurugaya-san, you're so good at it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ん？　まあな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Mm? Well, yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Mm? Well, yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「よし、じゃあ特別サービスだ。面白いものを見せてやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Alright, this is special service. I'll show you something interesting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Alright, this is special service. I'll show you something interesting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そう言うと、さっきまでとは少し違うしゃしゃ、という音。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The pattern of the sound changed subtly when she said this.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The pattern of the sound changed subtly when she said this.

MESSAGE.JP: ンゴの表面に何かを刻んでいるみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Apparently, she was now carving something into the surface of the apple.
MESSAGE.Translation: Apparently, she was now carving something into the surface of the apple.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「よし、これをキミに捧ぐ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Okay, this is for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Okay, this is for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: リンゴに『鬱』という字が刻み込まれていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She handed me an apple with the word ❛Melancholy❜ engraved on its surface.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She handed me an apple with the word ❛Melancholy❜ engraved on its surface.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、ムチャクチャすごいとは思うけど、病人に捧げる字じゃないよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, that's amazing, I'll give you that, but is this really something you should be giving a sick person...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, that's amazing, I'll give you that, but is this really something you should be giving a sick person...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ふむ、そうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Fumu, you don't think so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Fumu, you don't think so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「まあ、せっかくだからもうちょっと凝った切り方をするとしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, I might as well refine the shape a little bit further.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, I might as well refine the shape a little bit further.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんは次々とリンゴをウサギの形に変えていく。
MESSAGE.EN: She transformed the apple into three rabbit-shaped slices.
MESSAGE.Translation: She transformed the apple into three rabbit-shaped slices.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「定番だがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Standard items.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Standard items.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「見ろ、この三つを並べるとうっすらと『鬱』の字が見て取れるようになっている」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Look, when you line up the three of them, it reads ❛Melancholy❜ again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Look, when you line up the three of them, it reads ❛Melancholy❜ again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: やなウサギ三匹だった。
MESSAGE.EN: There were three ominous rabbits staring at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were three ominous rabbits staring at me.

MESSAGE.JP: りあえず、ウサギをひとつ摘む。
MESSAGE.EN: I picked one of them up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I picked one of them up.

MESSAGE.JP: んか、異様に細部が凝っているというか、バランスが芸術的というか…。
MESSAGE.EN: It was highly detailed with a kind of artistic balance...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was highly detailed with a kind of artistic balance...

MESSAGE.JP: べるのがもったいないくらいだな…。
MESSAGE.EN: It felt like a waste to eat it...
MESSAGE.Translation: It felt like a waste to eat it...

MESSAGE.JP: あ、それでも一口かじってみた。
MESSAGE.EN: But I still made myself take a bite.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I still made myself take a bite.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ugh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ugh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 口かみ締めたところで、喉の奥が抵抗を始める。
MESSAGE.EN: Soon as I took a bite, my throat protested.
MESSAGE.Translation: Soon as I took a bite, my throat protested.

MESSAGE.JP: それでも何とか飲み込んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I somehow managed to swallow it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I somehow managed to swallow it.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…ごめん、やっぱこれ以上無理」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I'm sorry, I can't eat any more.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I'm sorry, I can't eat any more.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「そうか。ならばすりおろしてみるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I see. I could always grate it for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I see. I could always grate it for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「さっきの棚にあったな、おろし金は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I spotted a grater on the shelf.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I spotted a grater on the shelf.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ谷さんはおろし金を持ってくると、無造作にリンゴをすりおろし始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: She came back with a grater in her hands and began grating the apple.
MESSAGE.Translation: She came back with a grater in her hands and began grating the apple.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、ちょっともったいないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, what a waste...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, what a waste...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「もったいない？　何がもったいないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝A waste? What is a waste?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝A waste? What is a waste?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ谷さんが顔を上げると、じゃりじゃりとリンゴをすりおろす音が止まる。
MESSAGE.EN: The crunchy sound abruptly stopped as she raised her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: The crunchy sound abruptly stopped as she raised her head.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、すごく上手く出来てたじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I mean it was just made so well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I mean it was just made so well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「あんなものまたすぐに作ることができる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Something like that can be done in no time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Something like that can be done in no time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「そもそもリンゴは観賞のためにあるものではない。食べるためにあるものだぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Besides, apples are not to be marveled at. They are to be eaten, are they not?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Besides, apples are not to be marveled at. They are to be eaten, are they not?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、そうなんだけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, you have a point, but still...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, you have a point, but still...❞

MESSAGE.JP: なくして、リンゴがすりおろし終わる。
MESSAGE.EN: It didn't take her long to finish grating the apple.
MESSAGE.Translation: It didn't take her long to finish grating the apple.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「よし、出来た」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Okay, it's done.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Okay, it's done.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「離乳食のようだな。よし、ばぶーとかちゃーんとかはーいとか言いながら食うといい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Looks like baby food. Okay, when you're eating, say something like ❛baboo,❜ ❛chaan,❜ or ❛haai.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Looks like baby food. Okay, when you're eating, say something like ❛baboo,❜ ❛chaan,❜ or ❛haai.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、言わないけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I won't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I won't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ースト状になったリンゴをスプーンですくい、口に運ぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: I carried some of the apple pulp to my mouth with a spoon.
MESSAGE.Translation: I carried some of the apple pulp to my mouth with a spoon.

MESSAGE.JP: これくらいならなんとか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I should be fine with something like this.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I should be fine with something like this.

MESSAGE.JP: 分の一ほど食べたところで、スプーンを置く。
MESSAGE.EN: After finishing around one-third of it, I put down the spoon.
MESSAGE.Translation: After finishing around one-third of it, I put down the spoon.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「もういいのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Was that enough?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Was that enough?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…これ以上はちょっときついかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Any more than this is going to be tough.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Any more than this is going to be tough.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「そうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ谷さんは僕の手から皿とスプーンを取ると、それを机の上に置いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san took the plate and spoon from me and set them on the desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san took the plate and spoon from me and set them on the desk.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「あとはまあ、おとなしくしてることだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝All you need now is to have some rest.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝All you need now is to have some rest.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや最初からそのつもりなんだけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, that's what I've been trying to do to begin with...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, that's what I've been trying to do to begin with...❞

MESSAGE.JP: い終わらないうちに、何か冷たいものを額に乗せられる。
MESSAGE.EN: Before I finished my words, she put something cold on my forehead.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before I finished my words, she put something cold on my forehead.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Whoa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Whoa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「さっきまでリンゴを冷やしていた保冷剤だ。タオルでも巻いて使うといい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It's an ice pack I used to cool the apples. It should be nice if you wrap it in a towel.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It's an ice pack I used to cool the apples. It should be nice if you wrap it in a towel.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「こっちの洗面器と濡れタオルは片付けておくぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'll take away this washbowl and this wet towel.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I'll take away this washbowl and this wet towel.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ああ、うん…ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, okay... Thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, okay... Thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: オルに巻いて、額に乗せなおした瞬間。
MESSAGE.EN: When I wrapped the ice pack in a towel and put it on my forehead...
MESSAGE.Translation: When I wrapped the ice pack in a towel and put it on my forehead...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（…う…わ…）
頭痛が襲い掛かってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...A terrible headache struck me.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...A terrible headache struck me.

MESSAGE.JP: 邪のせいで起こるものじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: It wasn't because of the cold.
MESSAGE.Translation: It wasn't because of the cold.

MESSAGE.JP: つもの、持病だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was my chronic disorder.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was my chronic disorder.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「…どうした、少年」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...What's wrong, young man?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...What's wrong, young man?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「また…ねなきゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I have... to sleep again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I have... to sleep again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: うじてその言葉を伝える。
MESSAGE.EN: I could barely squeeze the words out of my mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could barely squeeze the words out of my mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「そうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「なら、ゆっくりと休め」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Then, have a good rest.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Then, have a good rest.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 識はどんどんと沈んでいく。
MESSAGE.EN: My consciousness was rapidly slipping away.
MESSAGE.Translation: My consciousness was rapidly slipping away.

MESSAGE.JP: の中で。
MESSAGE.EN: And then...
MESSAGE.Translation: And then...

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「…キミは、だいじょうぶだからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...You're going to be fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...You're going to be fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ谷さんの少し濡れた冷たい手が、僕の頬に触れたような気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt Kurugaya-san's slightly cold and wet hand on my cheek.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt Kurugaya-san's slightly cold and wet hand on my cheek.

MESSAGE.JP: 闇の中。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Amidst the darkness.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Amidst the darkness.

MESSAGE.JP: もない、闇の中。
MESSAGE.EN: Amidst the darkness, there was nothing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Amidst the darkness, there was nothing.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（ああ、また、なにもない）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Ah, again there's nothing.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Ah, again there's nothing.)

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（僕はもう夢を見なくていいんだろうか…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Maybe I won't have to dream anymore...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Maybe I won't have to dream anymore...)

MESSAGE.JP: 間だけが加速度的に過ぎていくような感覚。
MESSAGE.EN: I could only feel time moving faster.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could only feel time moving faster.

MESSAGE.JP: が覚めたとき、いったいどれだけの時間が過ぎているだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: I wondered how long would have passed since I fell asleep, when I wake up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wondered how long would have passed since I fell asleep, when I wake up.

MESSAGE.JP: アノの音を聴いたような気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt as though I heard the sound of a piano.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt as though I heard the sound of a piano.

MESSAGE.JP: 憶のどこかにある、メロディを聴いたような気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: It felt as though it was a melody I had heard before.
MESSAGE.Translation: It felt as though it was a melody I had heard before.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、雨音が聞こえた気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: ...And I thought I heard the sound of rain.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And I thought I heard the sound of rain.

MESSAGE.JP: 白い。
MESSAGE.EN: ...White.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...White.

MESSAGE.JP: いところに上って町を見下ろしたとき。
MESSAGE.EN: I was looking down at the city from somewhere high above.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was looking down at the city from somewhere high above.

MESSAGE.JP: くかすむ空の向こうを見て。
MESSAGE.EN: Looking through the misty haze.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking through the misty haze.

MESSAGE.JP: 気って白いんだ、と思ったことがある。
MESSAGE.EN: The air is so white, I thought to myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: The air is so white, I thought to myself.

MESSAGE.JP: が見ているのは、その遥か遠くなのか、濃い空気の白の中なのか。
MESSAGE.EN: What was I looking at? Something far away, something obscured by the white mist.
MESSAGE.Translation: What was I looking at? Something far away, something obscured by the white mist.

MESSAGE.EN: A line...? A contour...?
MESSAGE.Translation: A line...? A contour...?

MESSAGE.JP: い光の束が、空気の白の中に浮かんでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: A thin beam of light was piercing the whiteness.
MESSAGE.Translation: A thin beam of light was piercing the whiteness.

MESSAGE.JP: の白の向こうに、鏡のような、波紋すら立たない湖面が見えた。
MESSAGE.EN: On the other side of the whiteness was a lake. Its surface was still as a mirror, not the tiniest ripple disturbing its tranquility.
MESSAGE.Translation: On the other side of the whiteness was a lake. Its surface was still as a mirror, not the tiniest ripple disturbing its tranquility.

MESSAGE.JP: 上げれば、白い綿が降り注いでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: When I looked up, I saw white cotton falling.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I looked up, I saw white cotton falling.

MESSAGE.JP: れは、雪だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was snow.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was snow.

MESSAGE.JP: 面に雪は、染み込むように消えていく。
MESSAGE.EN: When the flakes reached the surface, they disappeared as though seeping in.
MESSAGE.Translation: When the flakes reached the surface, they disappeared as though seeping in.

MESSAGE.JP: してそこには、何も残らない。
MESSAGE.EN: And nothing remained.
MESSAGE.Translation: And nothing remained.

MESSAGE.JP: ああ。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah...
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah...

MESSAGE.JP: ラスに手を当てる。
MESSAGE.EN: I put my hand on the glass.
MESSAGE.Translation: I put my hand on the glass.

MESSAGE.JP: の目の前のガラスは僕の息で白くなっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The glass before my eyes was white because of my breath.
MESSAGE.Translation: The glass before my eyes was white because of my breath.

MESSAGE.JP: っと、寒いのだろう。僕はガラス越しにその向こうを眺めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: It must be cold, I thought as I gazed through the glass.
MESSAGE.Translation: It must be cold, I thought as I gazed through the glass.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな夢も、目が覚めれば、何一つとして、思い出せなくなっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...And even a dream such as this would be forgotten once I woke up.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And even a dream such as this would be forgotten once I woke up.

MESSAGE.JP: 識が覚醒していく。
MESSAGE.EN: My consciousness returned.
MESSAGE.Translation: My consciousness returned.

MESSAGE.JP: りに、みんなの声が聞こえる。
MESSAGE.EN: I could hear everybody's voices around me.

MESSAGE.Translation: There was a painful expression on Kyousuke's face when he looked at her...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ほらほら、鈴もこっち向いてさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Come on, Rin, come over here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Come on, Rin, come over here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の中でも恭介から一番離れた場所に座った。
MESSAGE.EN: Even when she joined our circle, she sat as far away from Kyousuke as she could.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even when she joined our circle, she sat as far away from Kyousuke as she could.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…兄ちゃん、正直悲しい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Nii-chan is sad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Nii-chan is sad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 妹の確執は割と根強いもののようだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Seems like their rift was a rather serious one...
MESSAGE.Translation: Seems like their rift was a rather serious one...

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「さて…これは以前旅先で貰ったものだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well... I got this from my travels.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well... I got this from my travels.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「食うにも困って花火職人の手伝いをしてな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝When I was out of money to buy food, I was helping out making fireworks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝When I was out of money to buy food, I was helping out making fireworks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介はそれを手に取りながら呟く。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke muttered softly while holding it in his hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke muttered softly while holding it in his hands.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「へえ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「待て、ってことは…これ火薬の塊だろう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hold on, then, isn't that... stuffed with gunpowder?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hold on, then, isn't that... stuffed with gunpowder?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ああ、炸裂するとこの部屋程度は余裕で吹っ飛ぶな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, if it goes off, it would easily blow up the entire room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, if it goes off, it would easily blow up the entire room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ずっとこれは俺の部屋の押入れで眠っていたわけだが、時々思い出しては戦々恐々としていた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It was sitting in my room without use all this time, just giving me the creeps every once in a while when I remembered about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It was sitting in my room without use all this time, just giving me the creeps every once in a while when I remembered about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「火事でも起きていたら、俺の部屋から直径３００メートルの範囲にわたって、七色の火花が噴出されていたことだろうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝If there was ever a fire, everything in a 300 meter radius would've been painted in rainbow colors.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝If there was ever a fire, everything in a 300 meter radius would've been painted in rainbow colors.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわあああっ、じゃあこれ爆弾そのものじゃないかっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Woaah, that's totally a bomb!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Woaah, that's totally a bomb!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「おっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Oops.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Oops.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 取り落とす。
MESSAGE.EN: ...He dropped it.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...He dropped it.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわぁっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Whoa!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Whoa!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: こへずさーっ！　と謙吾が滑りこんできて、キャッチした！
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo leaped over and caught it, sliding on the floor!
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo leaped over and caught it, sliding on the floor!

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「落とすんじゃねぇよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Watch out!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Watch out!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「火の気がないうちは大丈夫だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We'll be fine, unless it catches on fire.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We'll be fine, unless it catches on fire.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「こいつを夜空に打ち上げる。そいつを二人じめってわけさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We're going to shoot this guy up in the night sky. You will be watching it together.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We're going to shoot this guy up in the night sky. You will be watching it together.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…この時期に花火大会なんてオツなものはないしな。イベントとしては最高だと思わないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...They don't have any fireworks festivals at this time of year. So, isn't that the best event possible?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...They don't have any fireworks festivals at this time of year. So, isn't that the best event possible?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「いや、言いたいことがよくわからんのだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝No, I don't really get your point.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝No, I don't really get your point.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「有り体に言って、理樹が来ヶ谷をデートに誘い、俺たちはそれをこの花火で演出する、ってことだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝In a nutshell, Riki will ask Kurugaya out on a date, and we'll be shooting this firework.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝In a nutshell, Riki will ask Kurugaya out on a date, and we'll be shooting this firework.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「なかなかロマンティックだろう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Isn't that very romantic?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Isn't that very romantic?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介らしいムチャクチャな案だね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's a crazy plan, just like something you would suggest...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's a crazy plan, just like something you would suggest...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「でも、面白そうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝But, that sounds like fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝But, that sounds like fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ああ、賛成だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Yeah, I agree.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Yeah, I agree.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「異論はないが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝No objections.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝No objections.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うん、花火は好きだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yep, I like fireworks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yep, I like fireworks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ああ、女の子はみんな花火が好きなもんなのさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, all girls like fireworks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, all girls like fireworks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 本当かなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Is that really so?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Is that really so?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「花火ってことは夜だよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, it has to be at night?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, it has to be at night?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「当然」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Of course.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Of course.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「夜空を彩る大輪の花火を眺める時間は、もはやふたりだけのもの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You'll be watching the fireworks light the sky, it'll be a time for just the two of you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You'll be watching the fireworks light the sky, it'll be a time for just the two of you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「否が応にも気持ちは盛り上がっていく…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Whether you want it or not, your feelings will rise...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Whether you want it or not, your feelings will rise...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そしてふたりは花火の後の静けさの中、愛を囁き合う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And when it's over and the silence falls, you'll be whispering love to each other.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And when it's over and the silence falls, you'll be whispering love to each other.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「愛……愛……愛……とな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Love... Love... Love... Like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Love... Love... Love... Like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あほだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝How stupid.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝How stupid.❞

MESSAGE.JP: も、今までの案のなかでは、一番僕たちらしいというか、リトルバスターズの本領発揮といった感じだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But among all the ideas so far, this one was really something that would show what the Little Busters were made of.
MESSAGE.Translation: But among all the ideas so far, this one was really something that would show what the Little Busters were made of.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「よし、じゃあ計画を練ることにしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, let's work out the details.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, let's work out the details.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: どう考えたってバカな企画だけど、そんなのを真面目に考えているこの時間が、一番ワクワクする。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It was a stupid plan no matter how you look at it, but when I started seriously thinking about it, I felt excited like never before.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It was a stupid plan no matter how you look at it, but when I started seriously thinking about it, I felt excited like never before.

MESSAGE.JP: れは昔からちっとも変わっていない。
MESSAGE.EN: This hasn't changed a bit since the old days.
MESSAGE.Translation: This hasn't changed a bit since the old days.

MESSAGE.JP: から、僕たちはリトルバスターズのままでいいんだと、そう思う。
MESSAGE.EN: That's why I thought the Little Busters should stay this way forever.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why I thought the Little Busters should stay this way forever.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（でもなんか、ここまでくると、恋の応援とかって感じじゃなくなってきたなぁ）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(But when it comes down to it, it's not like they're even helping me out with my love anymore.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(But when it comes down to it, it's not like they're even helping me out with my love anymore.)

MESSAGE.JP: う考えても普通はこんなことはしない。
MESSAGE.EN: I mean, this isn't something you'd normally do no matter what.
MESSAGE.Translation: I mean, this isn't something you'd normally do no matter what.

MESSAGE.JP: でも相手も結構普通じゃないしなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But then again, Kurugaya-san isn't the most normal person either.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But then again, Kurugaya-san isn't the most normal person either.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（喜んでくれるといいな、来ヶ谷さん）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(I wonder if she's going to be happy...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(I wonder if she's going to be happy...)

MESSAGE.JP: んなことを考えながら、その夜は遅くまでその花火を打ち上げる計画を練っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I kept thinking about things like that, as we worked out the details of our fireworks plan until late in the night.
MESSAGE.Translation: I kept thinking about things like that, as we worked out the details of our fireworks plan until late in the night.
